projectTasks.name: Design a directory structure
projectTasks.description: Design a directory structure for the project to segregate Terraform code, Lambda functions, and documentation.

projectTasks.name: Create documentation guidelines
projectTasks.description: Create documentation guidelines for all components of the project.

projectTasks.name: Plan CI/CD pipelines
projectTasks.description: Plan the implementation of CI/CD pipelines for automated testing, building, and deployment.

projectTasks.name: Integrate code quality tools
projectTasks.description: Integrate code quality tools for linting, formatting, and static analysis.

projectTasks.name: Develop version control strategy
projectTasks.description: Develop a version control strategy that accommodates the monorepo structure.

projectTasks.name: Develop code for DynamoDB deployment
projectTasks.description: Develop Terraform code for deploying a DynamoDB table.

projectTasks.name: Develop code for Network deployment
projectTasks.description: Develop Terraform code for deploying a Network (VPC, Subnets, Security Groups, etc).

projectTasks.name: Develop code for Lambda deployment
projectTasks.description: Develop Terraform code for deploying a Lambda functions.

projectTasks.name: Develop code for mini-app deployment
projectTasks.description: Develop Terraform code for deploying a mini-app.
